editor.error_can_only_have_one_npc_per_tile: There can only be one character per tile.
editor.error_character_not_found: Error: Character "{{name}}" is not set or misspelled.
editor.error_could not find parent tree of the: The tree that was changed does not have a parent and can therefore not be checked if it is part of the current module.

editor.error_fetching_user_module_from_server_s: An error occurred when loading the user module from the server state.
editor.error_generic_change_submitted_conflict: Your change could not be made because the value was already changed by another user in the meantime.
editor.error_gesture_pattern_does_not_exist: This gesture pattern doesn't exist anymore.
editor.error_image_is_not_deleted: Image has not been deleted or was already restored.
editor.error_image_lost_please_reupload: This image could not be found on the server. Please upload it again.
editor.error_image_size_too_large: Image file size is too large.
editor.error_item_change_submitted_but_item_doe: Your change could not be made because the item was deleted in the meantime.
editor.error_item_is_not_deleted: Item is already restored or was never deleted.
editor.error_map_marker_does_not_exist_on_map: The selected map marker does not exist on loaded map anymore.
editor.error_module_change_submitted_but_module: Your change could not be made because the module was deleted in the meantime.
editor.error_module_is_not deleted: Module is already restored or was never deleted.
editor.error_no_rights_to_edit_this_character: You don't have the rights to edit this character. Changes will not be saved.
editor.error_no_rights_to_edit_this_image: You don't have the rights to edit this image. Changes will not be saved.
editor.error_no_rights_to_edit_this_item: You don't have the rights to edit this item. Changes will not be saved.
editor.error_no_rights_to_edit_this_map: You don't have the rights to edit this map. Changes will not be saved.
editor.error_no_rights_to_edit_this_tree: You don't have the rights to edit this action tree. Changes will not be saved.
editor.error_not_authenticated: You have to be logged in to do this.
editor.error_not_authorized: You don't have sufficent permissions to do this.
editor.error_not_workshop_user_or_admin: You have to be a workshop teamer or admin to do this.
editor.error_server_entity_not_found: The entity with the type [{{type}}] and id [{{id}}] was not found on the server.
editor.error_set_tiles_unexpected_current_value: This tile change could not be executed because something was changed by another user in the meantime.
editor.error_socket_user_not_set: You are not logged in. Please reload the page.
editor.error_socketio_disconnected_server_stopp: Disconnected because the server stopped answering.
editor.error_tile_asset_does_not_exist: This tile asset doesn't exist anymore.
editor.error_workshop_change_submitted_but_work: Your change could not be made because the workshop was deleted in the meantime.
editor.error_workshop_is_not deleted: Workshop is already restored or was never deleted.
editor.item_id_already_exists: This item ID is already in use. Try a variation like '{{suggestion}}', or a more precise name.
editor.menu_main_game_play: Play the main game without any extra modules.
editor.menu_modules: Add-On Modules for the Main Game
editor.menu_modules_play: Play the game with the selected modules.
editor.queued_operation_skipped_because_previou: The queued action "{{operationName}}" wasn't executed because the previous action "{{previousOperationName}}" failed.
editor.queued_redo_skipped_because_previous_ope: The queued redo wasn't executed because of the previous error. If you still want to redo, please press the button again.
editor.queued_undo_skipped_because_previous_ope: The queued undo wasn't executed because of the previous error. If you still want to undo, please press the button again.
editor.reload_necessary_inconsistent_state: An error on this client lead to an inconsistency between the server and client data. Please reload the page to solve this problem, and tell the developer team that you saw this error.
editor.reload_necessary_server_was_updated: The server was updated and restarted. Please reload this page to use the current version.
editor.server_was_shutdown: The server needs to be restarted and will now shut down. The editor will automatically restart once the server is available again.
editor.wait_for_the_server: The server is not ready yet to execute further actions. Wait until the previous action completes.
editor.warning_animation_element_label_already_: This label is already used for another animation element.
editor.warning_duplicate_text_reference_id: This text reference id is already in use.
editor.warning_map_marker_label_already_used: This label is already used for another map marker.
editor.warning_npc_label_already_used: This label is already used for another character.
editor.warning_tile_interaction_trigger_label_a: This label is already used for another tile.

management.workshop_access_code_should_be_removed_a: For security reasons it's recommended to deactivate this password after the workshop with <1/>.

shared.error_403_insufficent_rights: The Server rejected your request because you have insufficent rights.
shared.error_429_too_many_requests: Too many requests. Please wait {{minutes}} minutes and {{seconds}} before trying again.

translation.importing_finished_failed_line_count: {{failedLines}} lines failed. Please try to import them again.
translation.makeshift_translation_system_add_missing: Current language for tile asset categories etc.
translation.makeshift_translation_system_description: Unfortunately tile asset categories, action editor template categories and character configuration options couldn't get a proper translation system so far. Instead we're getting this makeshift system for now. Whenever a new category or a new character animation (both for NPCs and for players) is added, click the "{{buttonName}}" button here so it shows up in the translation export.
translation.stats_conflict_in_source_language: Conflict - original text in {{sourceLanguage}} was changed
translation.stats_description: The following table shows how many strings aren't empty in the base language (not counting male/female variations), and how many of these strings are already translated into other languages.

undoOperation.changeDebugStartNode: Debug Start Node activated or deactivated.
undoOperation.updateMakeshiftTranslationSystemData: Change to value in makeshift translation system.
